name: Procheta Nag
title: Organizer of GDG Vancouver, UX/Product Designer
desc: It feels like a family reunion with similiar minded poeple coming together to learn, connect and share.

name: Pulkit Bhamai
title: Content Marketer
desc: DevFest, for me, is more than a tech fest where people not only find out the power of emerging technologies but also get a chance to connect with like-minded people and get insights on career development

name: Steven Lim
title: Web Developer
desc: I joined Devfest because I am excited to be part of the ever-evolving tech world! And It is where Developers share their experience so that we can learn and build the best version of ourselves and Git commit.
